text: A New Kind of Love is a 1963 American romantic comedy movie directed by Melville Shavelson and starring Paul Newman, Joanne Woodward, Thelma Ritter, Eva Gabor, George Tobias, Robert Clary. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1964. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1963 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Melville Shavelson Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies about fashion Category:Movies about journalists
title: A New Kind of Love
